lyrics: Gently, hold our heads\mGently, hold our heads on high\mAimless time, in fear now hide\mOverthrow the plan\mConfusion lies in all my words\mMad is the soul\mWe barricade ourselves in holes of temperament\mThis is the dawning of a new age\mA heart that beats the wrong way\mInsanity's crescendo\mGently, hold our heads\mGently, hold our heads on high\mWindcolor, second sight\mA touch of silence, the violence of dark\mIllusion span, the aroma of time\mShadowlife, the scent of nothingness\mInsanity's crescendo!\mInfinite fall of instinct\mOrder of one spells deceit\mInfinite lack of trust\mOrder of one obsolete\mOh, escaping time is all we lost ahead\mWhen it's found, can judgment make amends?\mFrom force-fed impressions let us mortify the mind\mEach soul to violate, each instinct to be rendered false\mTorn asunder be the conventional forms and frames\mNow for the blood of heaven unlearn\mâ€¦And the cleansing comes\mFelt a tremor in the pillars of the senses\mCursed victim of a distance near\mThe first dream, the clearest vision\mAimlessly steer towards our night\mWe belong to thee\mOh, dearest bliss, unnerving silence\mEntangled withinDimly begotten, in clarity found\mVirgin-like tears for impurity bound\mSearch he, who darken the stars and the sky\mGreet now this vision an emerald dawn\mEmpty the Sun, carve out the wind\mInsanity's crescendo, tear out the blinded eye\mInsanity's crescendo!\mLament of thunder, take comfort in fear\mLightning veins in crude exterior\mVoice the oppression, voice the hypocrisy\mLay down the law that made instinct fall\mEscape now and revert the cleansing rebirth\mTorn asunder be\mAffect me not on darkened vision\mInsanity's crescendo\mGrimly threat, the footstep's torn\mRebellic stand, the seeker tall\mTurn of insanity's hand\mTake this darkened vision from my sight\mNailed to the image of ignorance\mEach soul to violate\mFor the blood of heaven

Night and stars above that shine so bright\mThe mystery of their fading light\mThat shines upon our Caravan\mSleep upon my shoulder as we creep\mAcross the sands so I may keep\mThe memory of our Caravan\mThis is so exciting, you are so inviting\mResting in my arms\mThrill to the magic, the magic of your charms\mYou beside me here beneath the blue\mMy dream of love is coming true\mWithin our desert Caravan\mThis is so exciting, you are so inviting\mResting in my arms\mThrill to the magic, the magic of your charms\mNight and stars above that shine so bright\mThe mystery of their fading light\mThat shines upon our Caravan\mThat shines upon our Caravan\mOooh
